mapper.insert: insert into option_list(option_code, option_name, option_var, us_code, us_name, exe_type, strike_price, strike_month, call_put, first_tradedate, last_tradedate, change_percent, amount, pre_settle, open_price, highest, lowest, close_price, settlement_price, volume, position_vol, delta, in_value, time_value, update_time, valid) values (#{option_code},#{option_name},#{option_var},#{us_code},#{us_name},#{exe_type},#{strike_price},#{strike_month},#{call_put},#{first_tradedate},#{last_tradedate},#{change_percent},#{amount},#{pre_settle},#{open_price},#{highest},#{lowest},#{close_price},#{settlement_price},#{volume},#{position_vol},#{delta},#{in_value},#{time_value},#{update_time},#{valid})
mapper.update: update option_list set change_percent=#{change_percent}, amount=#{amount}, pre_settle=#{pre_settle}, open_price=#{open_price}, highest=#{highest}, lowest=#{lowest}, close_price=#{close_price}, settlement_price=#{settlement_price}, volume=#{volume}, position_vol=#{position_vol}, delta=#{delta}, in_value=#{in_value}, time_value=#{time_value}, update_time=#{update_time}, valid=#{valid} where option_code=#{option_code}
mapper.select: select * from option_list where us_code=#{code} and valid=1
